properties.areaDesc: Eastern Pendleton; Western Highland; Western Pendleton; Eastern Highland
properties.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 18 at 4:33AM EST until January 18 at 7:00PM EST by NWS Baltimore MD/Washington DC
properties.description:
* WHAT...Snow, sleet and freezing rain expected. Total snow and
sleet accumulations of less than one inch with ice
accumulations of one tenth to two tenths of an inch. Winds
gusting as high as 35 mph.

* WHERE...In Virginia, Highland County. In West Virginia,
Pendleton County.

* WHEN...From 7 AM to 7 PM EST today. Precipitation may be more
spotty or drizzly in nature early this morning before becoming
more widespread by mid to late morning. The steadiest wintry
precipitation is expected from midday through mid afternoon.

* IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Due to the cold
ground and road temperatures, snow and ice will accumulate on
all untreated surfaces.
properties.instruction:
Slow down and use caution while traveling.

When venturing outside, watch your first few steps taken on
steps, sidewalks, and driveways, which could be icy and slippery,
increasing your risk of a fall and injury.

NWSheadline: WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 PM EST THIS EVENING
